As she looked around she saw something she didn't expect, her friend Mimi. It had been a couple weeks since Sora had last seen her pink loving friend, Sora having been so wrapped up in her new hobby. 112.content: How exactly will Mimi get fat?
112.title: Mimi

choices: Sora is fat, but not as fat as Mimi.
Sora is as fat as Mimi.
1122.content:
Mimi's adventures had ended some time ago, around four months ago to be precise. During that time, she started to get lazy and began eating more. Surprisingly enough, she noticed this gain and decided to keep going along with it, since she didn't feel like stopping. As she grew, her shirts and skirts got tighter and buttons would frequently pop. Belts also became difficult to wear, since they squeezed Mimi's constantly growing belly. Mimi's parents were naturally concerned at first, but Mimi became determined to gain, so they decided to let her do so.

At the time this story begins, Mimi had reached 200 pounds. Her belly grew so large it seemed to be forming an apron. Mimi's face had grown an extra chin, while her cheeks plumped up considerably. Her limbs fattened up as well; basically, she was big all over. She even grew about four to six inches as a result of her gain.

Mimi was currently dressed in her signature cowgirl outfit, but she had grown so large it was hard for her skirt to hold itself together. She still wanted to keep it, so it was refitted for her as she grew. Her shirt wasn't so lucky, as the buttons popped of some time ago. Mimi kept it as a sort of accessory, but wore another solid shirt as her main top. It couldn't cover her belly, though, but Mimi didn't mind. She was enjoying her new size.

Mimi had just finished off a large slice of cake. As she patted her belly in content, she heard a knock at the door. She opened it to reveal her friend Sora, but as it turns out, Sora had gotten larger, too, but how much larger?
1122.title: Already fat

choices: The girls fatten up some more to get ready for competition.
The girls practice at Mimi's house.
11222.content:
"Mimi, uh, hi!" Sora didn't expect to see that her friend had gotten so fat.

"Uh, hi, Sora! How's things?" Mimi was just as surprised as Sora; knowing Sora, Mimi expected her to stay at her original weight.

"Fine, why? Oh, you're probably wondering why I'm so fat, right?" Sora said. It was true; Mimi couldn't believe Sora's new form. Sora gained in pretty much the same way Mimi did. Her belly poked out of her yellow shirt and was acting as a resting place for her hands, which looked like meatballs with sausages sticking out. Sora apparently outgrew all of her pants, as she was clad in a long, blue skirt that could probably fit her better than any jeans could, possibly even better than sweatpants, too. Her hair was tied back in a bun similar to Mimi's; she wasn't wearing her signature blue helmet.

"You probably wouldn't think much of sumo wrestling, Mimi, but I thought that I'd try it out. It's no professional league, but it's something I think I'll enjoy. So I fattened up to get in. Makes sense, right?" Mimi was still a little stunned, but felt that it did indeed make sense. "I guess so. Actually, I'm a little embarrassed. I just got fat because I wanted to!"

"Don't worry about it, Mimi. That's kind of why I gained, too!" Sora reassured her friend. "Hey, you know what? You should join the league! You'd be great!" Mimi never really thought about sumo wrestling at all, much less join a league. She did, however, want to hang out with Sora.

"Okay, I'm in! Let's go!"
11222.title: Sora is as fat as Mimi.

112221.content:
The girls made their way to the nearest restaurant and took the all-you-can-eat option, gathering as much food as possible that will fit on their plates. They dug in as soon as they felt that they had enough. They made sure to get a wide variety of food for balance and maximum fattening.

"You ready, Mimi?"

"Sora, I've been ready for an hour. Let's eat!"

The girls ate and ate, determined to gain more for their impending sumo matches. As they ate, they felt their skirts get a bit tighter, which didn't bother them, but Mimi's outer shirt, which was her cowgirl shirt, tore in the back.

"This shirt was getting too small, anyway." Mimi took it off and put it on the back of her chair, then continued eating. When the girls were done, they leaned back and patted their bellies, which had grown considerably after their lunch.

"That was good," Mimi said, "but I'm still a little hungry. You up for dessert, Sora?

Sora looked up and said, "Sure, if I can move." Sure enough, Sora had trouble getting out of her seat, as did Mimi, but the girls eventually waddled to the dessert area and ate enough to fill up.
112221.title: The girls fatten up some more to get ready for ...

1122211.content:
The girls gained another five pounds over four days, then went to their first practice. As they entered the ring, they were partnered with each other in battle and started their sparring match. It was fairly exhausting, since each girl exerted an enormous amount of energy getting there, then used more to fight. Their effort was not in vain, however. They fought an impressive match where they brought each other to the brink twice and came back twice. The coach called it a draw after five minutes, as both girls were about to collapse.

"Whew, huh, huh, good match." Mimi had trouble congratulating Sora afterwards; she was lee experienced in this type of fighting and also hadn't moved a great deal for months.

"You, too, huh." While Sora had a little bit of practice as a sumo already, she still hadn't gotten used to her size, yet, either.

As the coach called the next pair up for a match, Mimi and Sora sat down and sighed, wondering if it was a good idea to keep tiring themselves like this.

"I don't know if I can keep this up, Sora. That was one match and I'm totally drained," Mimi said.

"I have an idea. We need to get used to moving around like this if we're gonna be sumos. Let's go for a walk after we're done just to get us going." Sora's idea actually sounded good to Mimi. "As long as there's no running and we get to eat afterwards, I'm in."

11232.content:
Our story starts with Mimi awakening in the digital world, after the events of season 2.

When Mimi awoke she felt odd. She could remember going to her bedroom and sleeping soundly on her comfortable matress, but she felt grass beneath her instead.

'What's going on?' she thought as she tried to rise, only for her body to feel odd. Looking at her body she saw that she was fatter than before and let out a huge scream.

"What the?!" she gasped as she viewed her round spare tire belly that poked out from under her constricting shirt. She could also see her massive breasts, her bra which once fit perfectly was cutting into her skin. Her gigantic butt and thighs also were already ripping her once perfectly fit pants. Mimi was no longer the trim girl she once was.

"Mimi? Is that you?" asked the voice of Lilymon, her digimon's ultimate form.

"Lilymon! Thank goodness you're here!" Mimi began, running to the source of the voice. "Something terrible happened. I got fat somehow!"

"You're not the only one..." Lilymon muttered as Mimi saw her and gasped. Lilymon was even fatter than her. She had thunder thighs, a huge muffin top, fattened breasts, and a small second chin. While Mimi was probably 200lbs, Lily mon was probably 350 at least. "I woke up like this and I was looking for you."

"Oh Lilymon we need to figure out what happened to us. What part of the digital world are we in?"

"I'm not sure...This doesn't even feel like the same digital world. Maybe we should look around."

"Good idea, le-" Mimi began, when she heard other voices. Looking around she saw...

TK and his partner had been nocking down these darn control spires all day, of course, so were the rest of the digidestined who were free at the moment. Getting rid of them as fast as possible was a prerogative for all of them, and the past few weeks had been spent doing little else than blasting the darn things. 1311.title: Which Warriors?

13111.content:
Takuya was having a bad day. It started off with his little brother’s birthday which he was trying to be happy about, but it wasn’t easy with his little brother gloating about it all the time. He pretty much got what he wanted from mom & dad all the time anyway, this was just even more spoiling than usual. He tried to get a present for Shinya, but he didn’t like it, threw a tantrum which broke a vase in the house. & guess who got the blame, yep Takuya. He tried to enjoy the party, but he beat Shinya at a party game & he was also in trouble with his parents, a week of no soccer. Finally to add insult to injury, Takuya accidentally knocked over the birthday cake & he was also grounded for a month after that. Just when things couldn’t get any worse, a text message showed up, who was it from? Cherubimon, though he didn’t know at the moment that Cherubimon was making a preemptive strike to get to the warriors first. “Takuya, do you feel dissatisfied with the way your life is going? Would you like to get away from it all?”

Takuya tought for a moment & texted, “Yes & yes.”

“What would you say if I told you I could not only get you away from your life, but also make it a dream come true. All you need to do is come to the train station & get on the lowest floor to get on the trains & tell no one you are coming. Just show the ticket holders this text message & you will have a ticket to a whole new world of possibilities. Friends, family, love, & fortune. You will pay up what I want from you in exchange for your new life. I will explain it to you if & when you come to me. Will you accept my offer?” What does Takuya text as an answer?
13111.title: A Bad Day for Takuya

131111.content:
Then Takuya texted yes & got his digital ticket. He went to the train station with his change of clothes & some snacks in his backpack. “Mom, I’m going to the train station.” Takuya called as he went down the stairs, but not out the door.
“What for?” his mom called while making dinner.
“I’m meeting a friend there.” Takuya called out.
“Alright, but be home before 10, or you’ll be grounded for 2 months.”
“Okay mom.” He went out the door & ran to the station as fast as he could. “Goodbye chores, hello better life.”
At the train station, he gave his ticket to the ticket booth & went down to the basement level. As he got on the trains, Takuya saw two VERY important factors about this deal he didn’t realize before. 1, the trains looked way different than ordinary trains, as if drawn by cartoonists. & 2, it seems that he wasn’t the only kid who got this deal. It seems that dozens of others got it as well. He got his first-class ticket & went to the front where he saw a small boy with a white shirt & a big orange hat. He sat next to him & started talking. “Hey little guy, I’m Takuya. What ‘s your name?”
“Tommy, & I’m 9-years-old. How old are you?” Tommy said with a hopeful smile.
“I’m 11. So what brings you here to this little deal this stranger is giving us?”
“Oh, I wanted to make some friends & get a better relationship with my big brother, I’m gonna miss him.” He said sadly, then beamed up as he said “Hey, I’ve got an idea! Can you be my big brother in this new place, cuz’ I’m scared of what could go wrong.”
“Don’t worry little man. I have a little brother of my own, so I’ll be glad to take care of you. In fact, I came here for the same reason as you, except it’s my little brother I’m talking about.”
Then a deep, but kind voice, like a king’s, spoke through the intercom, “Testing, testing, is this thing on? Good! All passengers turn on cell phones & be ready to depart, we’ll be there in a half hour.” Then they felt the train accelerating at dangerous speeds as lights flashed in many colors all around them. The strangest thing that happened was that their cell phones were transforming into orbs of light which surrounded them & they were in an energy bubble as data, & they were naked. Yes, naked, just like in their digivolved forms. They felt weightless & numb from paralysis as their bubbles opened up from above & revealed ____ carrying them into a violet castle complex pinkish energy shining from it.
131111.title: To the Digital World, with a New Friend

1311111.content:
They were being carried by digimon called Chameleonmon (though they didn’t know it at the moment) into the Rose Morning Star where there on a throne was none other than the beautiful Cherubimon (in his beauty form). “Ah, Tommy, Takuya, there you are.”
They were both shocked, though ironically it was little Tommy who spoke first, “How do you know our names? What are you? & how are you going to change our lives?”
Cherubimon chuckled like jingling bells & said, “My dear sweet boy I know your names as I am a digital being, born of data about angels, & I treat all children as my own, so that’s how I know your names. & once I have the rest of the children here, you will all understand what I want in exchange for the reality change. In the meantime, enjoy yourselves right here in the orbs I have provided for your comfort. Don’t worry about being seen, your bodies will be covered as you undergo the transformation.”
There Tommy & Takuya stayed chatting for a while, eating plenty of snacks, being told not to worry about their health, especially when Cherubimon changes reality. Soon dozens of orbs were brought in with completely naked boys & girls (they weren’t covering their bras, but they were fine & so was everyone else. & everyone was chatting & eating. The first one to notice something strange was Takuya, it was his weight, or should I say his belly. It was noticeably more pooched out with a few rolls than before, so Takuya was noticeably fatter than before, this was probably because he has eaten so much more junkfood than he ever has in his whole life, & he hasn’t exercised it off.
Then Cherubimon came into the room & clapped his giant hands to get everyone’s attention. “Children, children, now that I’ve introduced myself to you all, let me explain what I want from you in exchange for reality. All I want is to be remembered on your body that I was the one who brought a better livelihood to you. I want you all to gain weight for the rest of your lives, in fat.” Everyone was quite confused about this statement & were talking to one another about it before Cherubimon hushed them up again. “Now I know what you’re thinking. But I will make sure everyone loves you despite your enormous weight & will take care of you in this reality, as well as all of you being able to meet each other again, & you won’t have to worry about your health in this reality. Now is everyone willing to accept? If you decide to back out, I will return you to the moment you got my text message & you will have no memory what happens after that, but you will be able to say no. All I hope is that you will all say yes & live as my child cherubs, forever.” So Takuya & Tommy thought for a moment if this was a good idea. What do they say (both must either say yes or no)

Ami shot up, "DORUMON LOOK OUT!"

There was a very akward silence. "Hush my child." a strange, cracking voice soothed the young teen, "Niether you or your digimon are in any danger."

She swirled around on the bed to meet the new voice, "What the?"

"Ami, calm down." Aoto put his hand on her shoulder, "We're all fine." he motioned to the petite, very wrinkled digimon with a calming motion, "These nice digimon took us in after we were all ambushed by SkullMeramon."

A Jijimon and Babamon smiled (though Jijimon's beard covered his up) at Ami. "We found you all passed out just outside town." the bearded elder digimon motioned outside the hut with his paw adorned staff, "So we decided to bring you nice young'ns into town."

"Wha?" Ami looked to Jounichi for an explination, who responded with an obviously fake smile.

Aoto nudged the fellow digidestined with his elbow, "Be nice."

"Fine." the gothic boy grunted, "Me and Impmon were the only ones concious so we filled them in." he narrowed his eyes back at Aoto, "Happy?"

"Children, such children." Jijimon shook his head. Ami suddenly freaked out again, "Where's Dorumon?!" Babamon picked up a small animal digimon, "He's not exactly back to one hundred percent, but he'll live."

Ami sniffled a little, "Dorumon..." she whimpered. "Ahaha... yeah, I guess I degenerated back to Dorimon, sorry Ami..."

The purplehaired digidestined gripped her fuzzball of a partner in a tight hug, "AHHH!!" he screamed, "Lemme go lemme go!!" Everyone cracked up at this (except the ever-stoic Jounichi)
---------
"So, what kind of town is this?" Ami asked, shocked at it's huge size, "It's more like a city!"

Floppy Town was absolutely huge. Bigger than the digidestineds' hometown by any means. With several tall buildings and even a radio tower (Station DGMN 005) peircing the sky, the local Bird type digimon could be seen happilly perched everywhere. The local plaza was clearly visible from the hutlike structure they had all been brought to, and many in-training and fresh digimon played peacefully. And near that there was a large colleseum where the local tournaments were held between the digimon.

Outside of the plaza, a mature and thriving city stood, supporting all of the Digimon who had become accustomed to the easy lifestyle. There was no loud traffic, yet there were roads ("For the Digimon with wheels?" Ami guessed) And even a university for the local knowledge-seeking Digimon.

Floppy Town was indeed a Digimon's ideal city.

Suddenly, Ami's stomach grumbled underneath her sweater. "What do you say we get something to eat?" she asked Dorimon, who she carried in her slender arms. "I'm for it!" the purple animal digimon agreed, "Aoto, you up for an eating contest?!"

ToyAgumon glared at Aoto, "Not another one! Last time you two ate poisonous mushrooms!" the chubby redhead glared back at his mechanical partner, "So?" he dragged the word out mockingly. "'SO?!' So you two ate 50 of them! EACH!"

"No need to worry about that, children," Jijimon comforted ToyAgumon, "There aren't any poisonous mushrooms here... unless of course, you want-"

Aoto raised his hands defensively, "No no, I'm good without them!"

Impmon stuck his tounge out at ToyAgumon, "Stop worryin', we're here to relax!" he turned to his partner, "Right Jounichi?!"

"Speaking of relaxing... how long can we stay here?" Ami turned back to the shrivled old couple of digimon. "You mean you were planning on leaving?" Babamon and Jijimon asked in unison

"Well... yeah!" Ami turned her head, "We've got to find a way back to the real world!"

"Nonsense, nonsense." Jijimon waved his hand dismissivley, "You can stay here as long as you like!"

Before Ami could retort, her stomach gurgled again. "Why don't we just get something to eat, and then we can find you a place to stay for the night?"
--------
"Mmmmhmmm!!" Aoto pat his swollen belly, "Who knew Bone Meat could taste so GOOD?!"

Impmon picked at his teeth with a toothpick, "Meh, I've had better, I really liked the onigiri though." Dorimon stuck out his tounge and gagged, "Bleh! I hate that stuff, I'm with Aoto on the Bone Meat!"

Ami, her own stomach swollen quite a bit, gave a polite little belch, "I've gotta say, I wouldn't mind staying if I could just get a place by that Digi-Deli Bakery!"

Jounichi had to admit, even the GothPocky tasted better than normal. Though, coming across some Pocky (let alone good Pocky) was pretty rare in the Digital World.

Jijimon and Babamon greeted the digidestined and their partners with arm faces just as they had before, "Welcome, Welcome back!" Jijimon greeted eagerly, "How did you enjoy your meals?" Babamon poked Aoto's paunch, "Quite well, it seems!"

The redheaded teenager blushed and turned away, embarrassed. "It was really good Jijimon, Babamon." Ami smiled, "Thank you again for recomending it, and thanks even more for paying!" Jijimon blushed, "Oh no problem, no problem at all, not for such young sprouts like you."

"I like it here!" Dorimon shouted, "Can't we stay?!"

Aoto scruffled his friend's fur, "Of course we can buddy!" Jounichi looked up, "Wait, we've got to get back home!" Impmon stood by Jounichi, as always, "Yeah! We've got a job to do!"

Aoto stood opposite his gothic counterpart, "If we're really suppossed to get home, the means will come to us, why can't we relax, just this once?!" ToyAgumon, not wishing to split hairs, stood in the center of the arguement.

"Um-" Ami stuttered

"Yeah, that's right Ami, we've got a job to do!" Jounichi forced her to his side. Aoto grabbed the other arm, "She didn't say that!" Ami sighed, releaved that at least one of her friends was thinking straight, "She thinks we should stay here and kick back, right?!"

The two engaged in a childish tug-of-war with Ami's opinion until Ami put a stop to it. "STOP IT!!" she yelled, making everyone jump slightly.

"Now, now." Jijimon's voice rippled anxiously, "Why don't you take a vote to it?"

Jounichi and Aoto's votes were set in stone. Ami thought about it for a second...

"I think we should stay?" Ami said nervously. "YEAHOO!!" Aoto, ToyAgumon, and even Dorimon jumped for joy. Even Impmon seemed happy about it.

Jijimon and Babamon smiled at eachother, glad that they could make their day.

And so, Ami, Jounichi, and Aoto's expansive adventure began in this strange new town on the Server Continent. Filled with perks of all kinds, how can they resist indulging a little? And as we all know, indulging usually leads to weight gain...
15.title: The Expansive Digital Adventure: Floppy Town

info.brief_description: The digidestined live out cool adventures throughout series. Now they're fat though.
info.description:
All the main characters of Digimon Adventure 1/2, Digimon Tamers, Digimon Frontier, & even the manga work out well. You can even add your own storyline that has nothing to do with any of this.You can use all the enemies & minor characters from the show or manga. You can add slight twists to the original plot. You can even make up your own story that has nothing to do with the manga or anime but still has to do with digimon.

Here's what I want in my interactive:

1# All chapters that aren't making important decisions have to be at least a paragraph long. So no one-liners.

2# Weight gain has to come with a little bit of height gain otherwise their proportions are off.

3# No slob or toilet stuff, but immobility is ok.

4# Keep weight gain as realistic as possible except when using magic or long time gaps (minimum 3 weeks).

5# No vore or unbirth, but inflation, stuffing, & force-feeding okay.

#6 Any form of sexuality is approved except transvestites & only reference sex if its a sexual scene. As of 12/11/2015, SEX IS OKAY to write about, but do it when the kids have been made decently fat.

P.S. I'm mainly going to be adding to the male characters of Digimon Adventure since it's my favorite. But if you have suggestions for other chapters or want me to add to the female weight gain, be my guest. Oh, & another thing, for anyone who has already added chapters, I hope to see new chapters frequently. I mean, c'mon people, I'm sure there are digimon fans out there who want to add to my interactive. I'll even pay you 100 gift points for chapter, 200 if it's really good.
